item.title: About
item.description: Documenting my travels abroad. Posting when I can. Photos are taken with a Fujifilm X-T30 II (XF27mm F2.8 R WR lens) and an iPhone 13 Pro. This site is hosted using GitHub pages and hugo. While traveling I’m building GymRats. Elixir, Swift, and Kotlin are my loves. Phoenix, Cocoa, and Compose are my muses. I work with a 13-inch, M1, 2020 MacBook Pro. It is ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•. I’m learning Portuguese on Duolingo.
